articles.title: Stokes and McCullum are 'pioneers' - Collingwood
articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes and coach Brendon McCullum are "pioneers" in their approach to Test cricket, according to England assistant Paul Collingwood.
articles.content:
England have won six of their previous seven Tests since Ben Stokes took charge
